\begin{document}

\subsubsection{Functional Behavior}

\begin{comment}
Describe the functional behavior provided by this operation. Also
add here any special considerations, assumptions, and dependencies
for this particular operation
\end{comment}


Modifies a specific track object’s information. By default if a user
attempts to update a track type with the name of a track type that
already exists, system will throw an exception as it is not allowed. 


\subsubsection{Call flow}

\begin{comment}
Insert below a sequence diagram (ping pong) diagram in context to
a complete call flow or transaction with numbered arrows and some
description explaining the sequence as appropriate.
\end{comment}

\begin{comment}
Summarize the different versions of this operation that are in production
or deleted by the current release of this service. 
\end{comment}


\begin{longtable}{|>{\raggedright}p{0.15\textwidth}|>{\raggedright}p{0.16\textwidth}|>{\raggedright}p{0.55\textwidth}|}
\hline
\hline 
\textbf{\footnotesize{Service Version}} & \textbf{\footnotesize{Major or Minor Impact}} & \textbf{\footnotesize{Changes Introduced by this Version}}\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline
\endfirsthead
\hline

\hline

\endhead

\subsubsection{Authentication and Authorization}

\begin{comment}
Describe OAuth model applicable to this operation.
\end{comment}


\begin{longtable}{|>{\raggedright}p{0.18\textwidth}|>{\raggedright}p{0.1\textwidth}|>{\raggedright}p{0.14\textwidth}|>{\raggedright}p{0.44\textwidth}|}
\hline
\hline 
\textbf{\footnotesize{Authorization Model}} & \textbf{\footnotesize{Subscriber Authorization required?}} & \textbf{\footnotesize{OAuth Scope Value}} & \textbf{\footnotesize{Brief Description}}\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline
\endfirsthead
\hline
\hline 
\textbf{\footnotesize{Authorization Model}} & \textbf{\footnotesize{Subscriber Authorization required?}} & \textbf{\footnotesize{OAuth Scope Value}} & \textbf{\footnotesize{Brief Description}}\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline
\endhead
\hline 
{\footnotesize{OAuth }}{\footnotesize \par}

{\footnotesize{authorization\_code}} & {\footnotesize{Yes}} & {\footnotesize{LOCKER}} & \begin{enumerate}
\item {\footnotesize{Redirect user to AT\&T authorization page to capture
User consent}}{\footnotesize \par}
\item {\footnotesize{Obtain Token obtained using authorization code issued
by the gateway alonf the client key and secret by making an Oauth
token call with GrantType=authorization\_code}}\end{enumerate}
\tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{longtable}

\subsubsection{Input Parameters}

\begin{comment}
In the table below, describe input parameters. Where different versions
support different input parameters, provide separate tables and indicate
which versions apply to each table. The allowed values for the Location
in Request column are: Header, Resource URI, Body or Query Parameter.
\end{comment}


{\footnotesize{\input{InputParam-Update_Track.tex}}}{\footnotesize \par}


\paragraph{Request – Example (Update a track using XML)\protect \\
}



This demonstrates how to update a track using XML.

\begin{lstlisting}[backgroundcolor={\color{shadebox}},basicstyle={\footnotesize\ttfamily},frame=single,framerule={.5pt}]
PATCH /locker/v1/tracks/2234456 HTTP/1.1 
host: api.att.com
authorization: Bearer abcdef12345678
accept: application/xml
content-type: application/xml

<track>
      <description>I LIKE THIS NEW DESCRIPTION better.</description>
</track>
\end{lstlisting}



\paragraph{Request – Example (Update a track using JSON)\protect \\
}

This demonstrates how to update a track using JSON.

\begin{lstlisting}[backgroundcolor={\color{shadebox}},basicstyle={\footnotesize\ttfamily},frame=single,framerule={.5pt}]
PATCH /locker/v1/tracks/2234456 HTTP/1.1 
host: api.att.com
content-type: application/json
authorization: Bearer 38C2399A23999
accept: application/json

{
  "track": { 
      "name": "my_new_file_name"
  }
}
\end{lstlisting}

\begin{comment}

support different output parameters, provide separate tables and indicate
which versions apply to each table. Note: ‘consent’ refers to end
user consent which may need to be obtained before data is returned,
\end{comment}

\paragraph{Response – Example (Update track response in XML)\protect \\
}

This shows the response to a track update in XML format.

\texttt{}
\begin{lstlisting}[basicstyle={\footnotesize\ttfamily},tabsize=4]
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
date: Wed, 27 Apr 2011 14:11:31 GMT
content-length:539
content-type: application/xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<track>
    <accessBlocked>false</accessBlocked>
    <av>
        <status>ok</status>
    </av>
    <contentSize>4102272</contentSize>
    <creationDate>05-02-2011 14:06:49 +0000</creationDate>
    <description>UPDATING DESCRIPTION</description>
    <extension>mp3</extension>
    <format>mpeg</format>
    <id>109</id>
    <metadataList>
        <metadata>
            <name>Album</name>
            <value>Final Fantasy VIII Piano Collection</value>
        </metadata>
        <metadata>
            <name>Artist</name>
            <value>FF8</value>
        </metadata>
        <metadata>
            <name>AudioBitrate</name>
            <value>160</value>
        </metadata>
        <metadata>
            <name>AudioCodec</name>
            <value>MPEG Audio</value>
        </metadata>
        <metadata>
            <name>Author</name>
            <value>FF8</value>
        </metadata>
        <metadata>
            <name>Drm</name>
            <value>0</value>
        </metadata>
        <metadata>
            <name>Duration</name>
            <value>206.316</value>
        </metadata>
        <metadata>
            <name>Genre</name>
            <value>Game</value>
        </metadata>
        <metadata>
            <name>Title</name>
            <value>Eyes on Me</value>
        </metadata>
        <metadata>
            <name>TrackNumber</name>
            <value>02</value>
        </metadata>
    </metadataList>
    <name>I love M&amp;M's.mp3</name>
    <collections>
        <playlists>
            <count>1</count>
            <creationDate>05-04-2011 18:48:47 +0000</creationDate>
            <description>Old School</description>
            <id>797</id>
            <name>Album</name>
            <size>4102272</size>
        </playlists>
    </collections>
    <previews>
        <preview>
            <format>jpg</format>
            <height>240</height>
            <url>https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&amp;ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&amp;preview=320x240xjpg</url>
            <width>320</width>
        </preview>
        <preview>
            <format>jpg</format>
            <height>90</height>
            <url>https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&amp;ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&amp;preview=120x90xjpg</url>
            <width>120</width>
        </preview>
        <preview>
            <format>jpg</format>
            <height>480</height>
            <url>https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&amp;ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&amp;preview=640x480xjpg</url>
            <width>640</width>
        </preview>
        <preview>
            <bitrate>1536k</bitrate>
            <channels>2</channels>
            <format>wav</format>
            <url>https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&amp;ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&amp;preview=1536kx2xwav</url>
        </preview>
        <preview>
            <bitrate>32k</bitrate>
            <channels>1</channels>
            <format>aac</format>
            <url>https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&amp;ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&amp;preview=32kx1xaac</url>
        </preview>
        <preview>
            <bitrate>64k</bitrate>
            <channels>2</channels>
            <format>aac</format>
            <url>https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&amp;ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&amp;preview=64kx2xaac</url>
        </preview>
    </previews>
    <shareCodes/>
    <sharingBlocked>false</sharingBlocked>
    <streamUrl>rtsp://streaming.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1/109_pc.3gp
    </streamUrl>
    <tags/>
    <url>https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&amp;ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1</url>
</track>
\end{lstlisting}



\paragraph{Response – Example (Update track response in JSON)\protect \\
}

This shows the response to a track update in JSON format.

\begin{lstlisting}[basicstyle={\footnotesize\ttfamily}]
HTTP/1.1 200 OK 
content-type: application/json 
content-length: 624 
date: Thu, 04 Jun 2010 02:51:59 GMT

{
  "track": {
   
    "accessBlocked": "false",
    "av": { "status": "ok" },
    "contentSize": "4102272",
    "creationDate": "05-02-2011 14:06:49 +0000",
    "description": "UPDATING DESCRIPTION",
    "extension": "mp3",
    "format": "mpeg",
    "id": "109",
    "metadataList": {
      "metadata": [
        {
          "name": "Album",
          "value": "Final Fantasy VIII Piano Collection"
        },
        {
          "name": "Artist",
          "value": "FF8"
        },
        {
          "name": "AudioBitrate",
          "value": "160"
        },
        {
          "name": "AudioCodec",
          "value": "MPEG Audio"
        },
        {
          "name": "Author",
          "value": "FF8"
        },
        {
          "name": "Drm",
          "value": "0"
        },
        {
          "name": "Duration",
          "value": "206.316"
        },
        {
          "name": "Genre",
          "value": "Game"
        },
        {
          "name": "Title",
          "value": "Eyes on Me"
        },
        {
          "name": "TrackNumber",
          "value": "02"
        }
      ]
    },
    "name": "I love M&M's.mp3",
    "collections": {
      "playlists": {
        "count": "1",
        "creationDate": "05-04-2011 18:48:47 +0000",
        "description": "Old School",
        "id": "797",
        "name": "Album",
        "size": "4102272"
      }
    },
    "previews": {
      "preview": [
        {
          "format": "jpg",
          "height": "240",
          "url": "https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&preview=320x240xjpg",
          "width": "320"
        },
        {
          "format": "jpg",
          "height": "90",
          "url": "https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&preview=120x90xjpg",
          "width": "120"
        },
        {
          "format": "jpg",
          "height": "480",
          "url": "https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&preview=640x480xjpg",
          "width": "640"
        },
        {
          "bitrate": "1536k",
          "channels": "2",
          "format": "wav",
          "url": "https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&preview=1536kx2xwav"
        },
        {
          "bitrate": "32k",
          "channels": "1",
          "format": "aac",
          "url": "https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&preview=32kx1xaac"
        },
        {
          "bitrate": "64k",
          "channels": "2",
          "format": "aac",
          "url": "https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1&preview=64kx2xaac"
        }
      ]
    },
    "sharingBlocked": "false",
    "streamUrl": "rtsp://streaming.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1/109_pc.3gp
    ",
    "url": "https://data.att-integration4.sdc.f-secure.com/data/1_0_0/track/?content_id=109&ticket=ae34af29-8623-47f2-9fa6-ab47867d87c1"
  }
}
\end{lstlisting}
